UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Multistep optimization of a cell-penetrating peptide towards its antimicrobial activity.
Literature.Author: Drexelius M, Reinhardt A, Grabeck J, Cronenberg T, Nitsche F, Huesgen PF, Maier B, Neundorf I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC50=5.9µM),Corynebacterium glutamicum ATCC 13032(MIC50=5.5µM),Micrococcus luteus DSM 20030(MIC50=18.9µM),Mycobacterium phlei DSM 48214(MIC50=>25µM),Pseudomonas fluorescens DSM 50090(MIC50=12.6µM),Salmonella typhimurium TA100(MIC50=16.4µM),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC50=>25µM)
